alert.note: Alert for Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 25 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Live Oak County through 615 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Clegg, or 10 miles southwest of George West, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... George West. This includes the following highways... US Highway 281 between mile markers 628 and 642. US Highway 59 between mile markers 720 and 736. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
